row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR# = ";" :SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "," :SET &UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD# = ""
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = "grant " :IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_SYS_PRIVILEGE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_SYS_PRIVILEGE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_OBJ_PRIVILEGE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_OBJ_PRIVILEGE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_ROLE_PRIVILEGE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_ROLE_PRIVILEGE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_CUST_ROLE_PRVLG# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_CUST_ROLE_PRVLG#") :ENDIF
:IF "YES" = &UC4RB_GRANT_ALL_SYS_PRIVILEGES# OR &UC4RB_GRANT_ALL_USER_PRVLGS# : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " all privileges") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_ON_SCHM_OBJ# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " ON &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_ON_SCHM_OBJ# ") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_TO_USER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " TO &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_TO_USER#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_TO_ROLE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " TO &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_TO_ROLE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_GRANT_TO_PUBLIC# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " TO public") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_WITH_HIERARCHY_OPTION# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " with hierarchy option") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_WITH_GRANT_OPTION# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " with grant option") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_WITH_ADMIN_OPTION# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " with admin option") :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, ";") :SET &UC4RB_SQL_DATABASENAME# = ""
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT
